alert.note: Alert for Northwest Blue Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 09 at 10:45AM PST until December 10 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northwest Blue Mountains. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 10 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will start out as snow this afternoon before transitioning to a rain/snow mix by Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained for Oregon by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com, or for Washington by visiting online at https://wsdot.com/travel.
